cite.cite_text: Section 612 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 17191)

doc_names: Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007

execution.ampl:
rewrite this as <__xml__ id="H7FEA2F71949C4211822AFC6CBC37FD2B" orig_name="quotedContent">
	<section identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/b/qB/s613" id="HE64ED0EE5F9942E19A49ED96978A54A4" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1306">
		<num value="613">“SEC. 613.</num>
		<heading> Hydrothermal research and development.</heading>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/b/qB/s613/a" id="H2BB21A5CEB484204B1A500D413AE1108" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1306">
			<num value="a">“(a)</num>
			<heading> In general.—</heading>
			<content>The Secretary shall carry out a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application for geothermal energy production from hydrothermal systems.</content>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/b/qB/s613/b" id="H4F78E55675AA43CE89B9E804B1064DA4" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1306">
			<num value="b">“(b)</num>
			<heading> Programs.—</heading>
			<chapeau>The program authorized in subsection (a) shall include the following:</chapeau>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/b/qB/s613/b/1" id="H931EED909FAE4AC3915823EE9AA86C2C" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1306">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<heading> Advanced hydrothermal resource tools.—</heading>
				<content>The research and development of advanced geologic tools to assist in locating hydrothermal resources, and to increase the reliability of site characterization, including the development of new imaging and sensing technologies and techniques to assist in prioritization of targets for characterization;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/b/qB/s613/b/2" id="HBA7E393202784F11BAFFC527832FB64F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1306">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<heading> Exploratory drilling for geothermal resources.—</heading>
				<content>The demonstration of advanced technologies and techniques of siting and exploratory drilling for undiscovered resources in a variety of geologic settings, carried out in collaboration with industry partners that will assist in the acquisition of high quality data sets relevant for hydrothermal subsurface characterization activities.”</content>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
	</section>
</__xml__>;

cite.cite_text: Section 613 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 17192)

doc_names: Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007

execution.ampl:
rewrite this as <__xml__ id="H500D63BFD9454572A3A3A5314FD89192" orig_name="quotedContent">
	<section identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614" id="HC3C9CD308E1D42D38E49176A4C8F42AF" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
		<num value="614">“SEC. 614.</num>
		<heading> General geothermal systems research and development.</heading>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/a" id="HF7791D7B331D43B58ECE6DBB5E54587D" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
			<num value="a">“(a)</num>
			<heading> Subsurface components and systems.—</heading>
			<content>The Secretary shall support a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of components and systems capable of withstanding geothermal environments and necessary to develop, produce, and monitor geothermal reservoirs and produce geothermal energy.</content>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/b" id="HC6C41D5BAF7E453CB1C18525CC23AFDB" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
			<num value="b">“(b)</num>
			<heading> Environmental impacts.—</heading>
			<chapeau>The Secretary shall—</chapeau>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/b/1" id="HA0685E13645045E7B0C46E3D7163574A" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<content> support a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of technologies and practices designed to mitigate or preclude potential adverse environmental impacts of geothermal energy development, production or use; </content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/b/2" id="H39E5A680FD9A41E9962346BE80FD0E9E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<content> support a research program to identify potential environmental impacts, including induced seismicity, and environmental benefits of geothermal energy development, production, and use, and ensure that the program described in paragraph (1) addresses such impacts, including water use and effects on groundwater and local hydrology;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/b/3" id="H469312C8F2994876B87659031034B739" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
				<num value="3">“(3)</num>
				<content> support a program of research to compare the potential environmental impacts and environmental benefits identified as part of the development, production, and use of geothermal energy with the potential emission reductions of greenhouse gases gained by geothermal energy development, production, and use; and</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/b/4" id="HB6D27D20A32A41D38A75E55880B958DA" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
				<num value="4">“(4)</num>
				<content> in carrying out this section, the Secretary shall, to the maximum extent practicable, consult with relevant federal agencies, including the Environmental Protection Agency.</content>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/c" id="H89560FD0F6E7448F96D7A6B49E921556" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
			<num value="c">“(c)</num>
			<heading> Reservoir thermal energy storage.—</heading>
			<content>The Secretary shall support a program of research, development, and demonstration of reservoir thermal energy storage, emphasizing cost-effective improvements through deep direct use engineering, design, and systems research.</content>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/d" id="H6C4EB093A4334E3E9AE79ED7B6D402E0" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
			<num value="d">“(d)</num>
			<heading> Oil and gas technology transfer initiative.—</heading>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/d/1" id="HBB9308B4039C472FA0E1E0970836046D" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<heading> In general.—</heading>
				<content>The Secretary shall support an initiative among the Office of Fossil Energy, the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, and the private sector to research, develop, and demonstrate relevant advanced technologies and operation techniques used in the oil and gas sector for use in geothermal energy development.</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/d/2" id="H4BB4F064C527492B9A6E19E7B24C1494" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<heading> Priorities.—</heading>
				<content>In carrying out paragraph (1), the Secretary shall prioritize technologies with the greatest potential to significantly increase the use and lower the cost of geothermal energy in the United States, including the cost and speed of geothermal drilling surface technologies, large- and small-scale drilling, and well construction.</content>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/e" id="HA2343EBF7F204905813CF716CFC236CA" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
			<num value="e">“(e)</num>
			<heading> Coproduction of geothermal energy and minerals production research and development initiative.—</heading>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/e/1" id="H3994D02E9DF84F0F9EAC9C232F8D2CAE" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1307">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<heading> In general.—</heading>
				<content>The Secretary shall carry out a research and development initiative under which the Secretary shall provide financial assistance to demonstrate the coproduction of critical minerals from geothermal resources.</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/e/2" id="HDCC5B1B0A8CF416B957E71303DF0D01C" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<heading> Requirements.—</heading>
				<chapeau>An award made under paragraph (1) shall—</chapeau>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/e/2/A" id="H3054A514C338470AA95B97E6668F5E4F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
					<num value="A">“(A)</num>
					<content> improve the cost effectiveness of removing minerals from geothermal brines as part of the coproduction process;</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/e/2/B" id="H62C6491B18A34EC7AEA36DAF87C5737B" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
					<num value="B">“(B)</num>
					<content> increase recovery rates of the targeted mineral commodity;</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/e/2/C" id="H414F640C306F42A09A795BA3FAEC5E7C" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
					<num value="C">“(C)</num>
					<content> decrease water use and other environmental impacts, as determined by the Secretary; and</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/e/2/D" id="H780E7E821D714BFABADF9FF4BCBFC7C9" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
					<num value="D">“(D)</num>
					<content> demonstrate a path to commercial viability.</content>
				</subparagraph>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/f" id="H3750C3C5E7E54C58AF675FD2196CC4E4" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
			<num value="f">“(f)</num>
			<heading> Flexible operations.—</heading>
			<content>The Secretary shall support a research initiative on flexible operation of geothermal power plants.</content>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/g" id="HD4D0AF8A00694F20AC5EA1DD30867714" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
			<num value="g">“(g)</num>
			<heading> Integrated energy systems.—</heading>
			<content>The Secretary shall identify opportunities for joint research, development, and demonstration programs between geothermal systems and other energy generation or storage systems.</content>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/h" id="HC4E1D5CB66BC4C3886F45DE7A6A1D670" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
			<num value="h">“(h)</num>
			<heading> Drilling data repository.—</heading>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/h/1" id="H4B6B8BF196C74BF0991EF4156B80C2DE" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<heading> In general.—</heading>
				<content>The Secretary shall, in consultation with the Secretary of the Interior, establish and operate a voluntary, industry-wide repository of geothermal drilling information to lower the cost of future geothermal drilling.</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/h/2" id="HF7C60CB1BE474358AFC4E26162285D78" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<heading> Repository.—</heading>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/h/2/A" id="HD3976D3B00094AC1BE432D192466C127" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
					<num value="A">“(A)</num>
					<heading> In general.—</heading>
					<content>In carrying out paragraph (1), the Secretary shall collaborate with countries utilizing a significant amount of geothermal energy, as determined by the Secretary.</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/c/qB/s614/h/2/B" id="HEC80638EC8DF4C5BABFF38C3E1F8BF86" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
					<num value="B">“(B)</num>
					<heading> Data system.—</heading>
					<content>The repository established under paragraph (1) shall be integrated with the National Geothermal Data System.”</content>
				</subparagraph>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
	</section>
</__xml__>;

cite.cite_text: Section 614 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 17193)

doc_names: Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007

execution.ampl:
rewrite this as <__xml__ id="H422EB001BE9A4C39AAAF99A7FD7B3F6B" orig_name="quotedContent">
	<section identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615" id="H4AF955FEDE424F32BAA49BF48BAFA570" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
		<num value="615">“SEC. 615.</num>
		<heading> Enhanced geothermal systems research and development.</heading>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/a" id="HA83C387903F44362B4F89737703DBDDA" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
			<num value="a">“(a)</num>
			<heading> In general.—</heading>
			<content>The Secretary shall support a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application for enhanced geothermal systems, including the programs described in subsection (b).</content>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b" id="H060C1DCA32DA4DDCBD4B8C5B52B2F6E0" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
			<num value="b">“(b)</num>
			<heading> Enhanced geothermal systems technologies.—</heading>
			<chapeau>In collaboration with industry partners, institutions of higher education, and the national laboratories, the Secretary shall support a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of the technologies to achieve higher efficiency and lower cost enhanced geothermal systems, including—</chapeau>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/1" id="HF4C568391F944ED4AEE518F4DE4EF669" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<content> reservoir stimulation;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/2" id="H2BE19F8EEF854FD7AF2ACEBEDA1B4D57" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<content> drilled, non-stimulated (e.g. closed-loop) reservoir technologies;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/3" id="HDBEC3C9ADB144C99B18A638FA6E65D01" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="3">“(3)</num>
				<content> reservoir characterization, monitoring, and modeling and understanding of the surface area and volume of fractures;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/4" id="H4AAA4874394F4BCCB92EF2B705D828CB" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="4">“(4)</num>
				<content> stress and fracture mapping including real time monitoring and modeling;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/5" id="H103B1F14002A4794913B3D67F64CC299" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="5">“(5)</num>
				<content> tracer development;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/6" id="H8B03E460091C4CBFB51E673158F8D91E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="6">“(6)</num>
				<content> three and four-dimensional seismic imaging and tomography;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/7" id="H1F93ED85CF9B4E3C9B3F46F17C2BF41E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="7">“(7)</num>
				<content> well placement and orientation;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/8" id="H1016EACDCCA648AD8C0C2B9F0AD4C4DC" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1308">
				<num value="8">“(8)</num>
				<content> long-term reservoir management;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/9" id="H58884C7AB8EA488D85AB707149874198" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="9">“(9)</num>
				<content> drilling technologies, methods, and tools;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/10" id="H93174A2A702E4FD9AFD2075E0D976370" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="10">“(10)</num>
				<content> improved exploration tools;</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/11" id="HF8DD2AEAD53F4BFAA0832C2C7368F60A" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="11">“(11)</num>
				<content> zonal isolation; and</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/b/12" id="H9658298C486B4C49871560423CDC4915" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="12">“(12)</num>
				<content> understanding induced seismicity risks from reservoir engineering and stimulation.</content>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c" id="H4C506E490E054398ADA966941F16FF74" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
			<num value="c">“(c)</num>
			<heading> Frontier observatory for research in geothermal energy.—</heading>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/1" id="H0F6EAA42AB8641DFA3F1401FFC609BA9" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<heading> In general.—</heading>
				<content>The Secretary shall support the establishment and construction of up to 3 field research sites, which shall each be known as a ‘<quotedText>Frontier Observatory for Research in Geothermal Energy</quotedText>’ or ‘<quotedText>FORGE</quotedText>’ site to develop, test, and enhance techniques and tools for enhanced geothermal energy.</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/2" id="H7FC069DE9B544329AD8DD787E644015A" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<heading> Duties.—</heading>
				<chapeau>The Secretary shall—</chapeau>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/2/A" id="H31E89CAEA94C45598770358F7266E8B0" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
					<num value="A">“(A)</num>
					<content> provide financial assistance in support of research and development projects focused on advanced monitoring technologies, new technologies and approaches for implementing multi-zone stimulations, nonstimulation techniques, and dynamic reservoir modeling that incorporates all available high-fidelity characterization data; and</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/2/B" id="HA500FAD590CE4290B32B529AF0A8941E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
					<num value="B">“(B)</num>
					<content> seek opportunities to coordinate efforts and share information with domestic and international partners engaged in research and development of geothermal systems and related technology, including coordination between FORGE sites.</content>
				</subparagraph>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/3" id="HA88CC5B767AE47018EFD86F7140668E4" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="3">“(3)</num>
				<heading> Site selection.—</heading>
				<chapeau>Of the FORGE sites referred to in paragraph (1), the Secretary shall—</chapeau>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/3/A" id="H8AFE040BBE524E15B8AA7C4245B58CF0" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
					<num value="A">“(A)</num>
					<content> consider applications through a competitive, merit-reviewed process, from National Laboratories, multi-institutional collaborations, institutes of higher education and other appropriate entities best suited to provide national leadership on geothermal related issues and perform the duties enumerated under this subsection;</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/3/B" id="HAA27628E4C07496BA262915779757A47" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
					<num value="B">“(B)</num>
					<content> prioritize existing field sites and facilities with capabilities relevant to the duties enumerated under this subsection;</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/3/C" id="HEC0F41232D004C3FBC59561C9768CB5C" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
					<num value="C">“(C)</num>
					<content> determine the mission need for and potential location of subsequent FORGE sites following the completion of construction and one year of operation of two FORGE sites; and</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/3/D" id="H2BC8227EE01F455989D0F87ABFA7818C" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
					<num value="D">“(D)</num>
					<content> ensure geologic diversity among FORGE sites when developing subsequent sites, to the maximum extent practicable.</content>
				</subparagraph>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/4" id="H40400F1FCFDC49FFBB33C0CB55833C00" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="4">“(4)</num>
				<heading> Existing forge sites.—</heading>
				<content>A FORGE site already in existence on the date of enactment of this Act may continue to receive support.</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/5" id="H0D3B91B2A6BA4C2B992E24C8A3721016" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="5">“(5)</num>
				<heading> Site operation.—</heading>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/5/A" id="HF4359C127D474F10852D0D28EEA4BA13" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
					<num value="A">“(A)</num>
					<heading> Initial duration.—</heading>
					<content>FORGE sites selected under paragraph (3) shall operate for an initial term of not more than 7 years after the date on which site operation begins.</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/5/B" id="H866A29851E9E4A73A2AD32BCC7116FC9" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
					<num value="B">“(B)</num>
					<heading> Performance metrics.—</heading>
					<content>The Secretary shall establish performance metrics for each FORGE site supported under this paragraph, which may be used by the Secretary to determine whether a FORGE site should continue to receive funding.</content>
				</subparagraph>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/6" id="H501CF6E853B349AE9A1AC43CA618D325" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1309">
				<num value="6">“(6)</num>
				<heading> Additional terms.—</heading>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/6/A" id="H9069D457E44A4DBAA540D342DBE50CB1" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
					<num value="A">“(A)</num>
					<heading> In general.—</heading>
					<chapeau>At the end of an operational term described in subparagraph (B), a FORGE site may—</chapeau>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/6/A/i" id="HA09F46F806C14C14982F42BCD6E291BE" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="i">“(i)</num>
						<content> be transferred to other public or private entities for further enhanced geothermal testing; or</content>
					</clause>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/6/A/ii" id="HE1E8BBE7BFCF4174B0FA3933A2EA391B" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="ii">“(ii)</num>
						<content> subject to appropriations and a merit review by the Secretary, operate for an additional term of not more than 7 years.</content>
					</clause>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/6/B" id="H9E31E04CA2C643AA8667DDD80EBC33EC" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
					<num value="B">“(B)</num>
					<heading> Operational term described.—</heading>
					<chapeau>An operational term referred to in subparagraph (A)—</chapeau>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/6/B/i" id="H2C058B170ABA4B9E953CF2A323EA8B6B" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="i">“(i)</num>
						<content> in the case of an existing FORGE site, is the existing operational term; and</content>
					</clause>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/6/B/ii" id="H3284612CE6384AB98A5CB1114CEC2A95" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="ii">“(ii)</num>
						<content> in the case of new FORGE sites selected under paragraph (3), is the initial term under paragraph (5)(A) or an additional term under subparagraph (A)(ii) of this paragraph.</content>
					</clause>
				</subparagraph>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/7" id="HDE945FF7C9EF4CC5835100C06BB7BB97" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
				<num value="7">“(7)</num>
				<heading> Funding.—</heading>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/7/A" id="H90220182582D40DA84FB04034C240E81" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
					<num value="A">“(A)</num>
					<heading> In general.—</heading>
					<chapeau>Out of funds authorized to be appropriated under section 623, there shall be made available to the Secretary to carry out the FORGE activities under this paragraph—</chapeau>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/7/A/i" id="H9A351CA39D8542E79C35C82A0FB5A232" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="i">“(i)</num>
						<content> $45,000,000 for fiscal year 2021;</content>
					</clause>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/7/A/ii" id="H1B78616DD85741E996F3D48993C00C3F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="ii">“(ii)</num>
						<content> $55,000,000 for fiscal year 2022;</content>
					</clause>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/7/A/iii" id="HC94C2DBF573043A68F7A1969FD9F794E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="iii">“(iii)</num>
						<content> $65,000,000 for fiscal year 2023;</content>
					</clause>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/7/A/iv" id="H2BB83732FC1E4B6D97ED3204F8024C2E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="iv">“(iv)</num>
						<content> $70,000,000 for fiscal year 2024; and</content>
					</clause>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/7/A/v" id="H1B304B033C194979BF473D25B902980F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="v">“(v)</num>
						<content> $70,000,000 for fiscal year 2025.</content>
					</clause>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/c/7/B" id="H444D4F28362547BB9E2AA97892F5AF13" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
					<num value="B">“(B)</num>
					<heading> Considerations.—</heading>
					<content>In carrying out this subsection, the Secretary shall consider the balance between funds dedicated to construction and operations and research activities to reflect the state of site development.</content>
				</subparagraph>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d" id="H8D4A3E4F70B44D8CAA39B986B4A56D0E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
			<num value="d">“(d)</num>
			<heading> Enhanced geothermal systems demonstrations.—</heading>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/1" id="HA13BB0CEA5A24CCD8C50143D3D85187E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<heading> In general.—</heading>
				<content>Beginning on the date of enactment of this section, the Secretary, in collaboration with industry partners, institutions of higher education, and the national laboratories, shall support an initiative for demonstration of enhanced geothermal systems for power production or direct use.</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2" id="HD9D553D954214A2E8433A976A9D97E5D" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<heading> Projects.—</heading>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2/A" id="H6F769C87B54F46DBA8C1205464C2C48F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
					<num value="A">“(A)</num>
					<heading> In general.—</heading>
					<content>Under the initiative described in paragraph (1), 4 demonstration projects shall be carried out in locations that are potentially commercially viable for enhanced geothermal systems development, while also considering environmental impacts to the maximum extent practicable, as determined by the Secretary.</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2/B" id="HFE296A122E414C2A908615A9456F7882" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
					<num value="B">“(B)</num>
					<heading> Requirements.—</heading>
					<chapeau>Demonstration projects under subparagraph (A) shall—</chapeau>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2/B/i" id="H2C93E0A3D43D400CAE0FBEF6CBA9BA5B" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="i">“(i)</num>
						<chapeau> collectively demonstrate—</chapeau>
						<subclause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2/B/i/I" id="HDBC8F525F3054CAD9EE7A26C5B75414B" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
							<num value="I">“(I)</num>
							<content> different geologic settings, such as hot sedimentary aquifers, layered geologic systems, supercritical systems, and basement rock systems; and</content>
						</subclause>
						<subclause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2/B/i/II" id="HB88598C811AB44A8AAB3277B63D02872" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
							<num value="II">“(II)</num>
							<content> a variety of development techniques, including open hole and cased hole completions, differing well orientations, and stimulation and nonstimulation mechanisms; and</content>
						</subclause>
					</clause>
					<clause identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2/B/ii" id="HAB44DEF2B5EE4F78BC7D499DBF6145D8" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1310">
						<num value="ii">“(ii)</num>
						<content> to the extent practicable, use existing sites where subsurface characterization or geothermal energy integration analysis has been conducted.</content>
					</clause>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2/C" id="H9BBD601442B04A64A45DA2B54F0ED4DF" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1311">
					<num value="C">“(C)</num>
					<heading> Eastern demonstration.—</heading>
					<content>Not fewer than 1 of the demonstration projects carried out under subparagraph (A) shall be located an area east of the Mississippi River that is suitable for enhanced geothermal demonstration for power, heat, or a combination of power and heat.</content>
				</subparagraph>
				<subparagraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/2/D" id="HBE2C4D1757E84631B1E5F8084E3ED8AA" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1311">
					<num value="D">“(D)</num>
					<heading> Milestone-based demonstration projects.—</heading>
					<content>The Secretary may carry out demonstration projects under this subsection as a milestone-based demonstration project under section 9005 of the <shortTitle>Energy Act of 2020</shortTitle>.</content>
				</subparagraph>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/d/qB/s615/d/3" id="HE922BDBE49C145C089AF104C389A170C" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1311">
				<num value="3">“(3)</num>
				<heading> Funding.—</heading>
				<content>Out of funds authorized to be appropriated under section 623, there shall be made available to the Secretary to carry out the demonstration activities under this subsection $21,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2021 through 2025.”</content>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
	</section>
</__xml__>;

execution.ampl:
rewrite this as <__xml__ id="H2A7D1BC3BD164F26B06FD847FC668E97" orig_name="quotedContent">
	<section identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/g/1/qB/s618" id="H31CADC62725846F390796A067799AFA3" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1313">
		<num value="618">“SEC. 618.</num>
		<heading> Advanced geothermal computing and data science research and development.</heading>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/g/1/qB/s618/a" id="H262B5008E09C4F0EBB750651F1F44416" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1313">
			<num value="a">“(a)</num>
			<heading> In general.—</heading>
			<content>The Secretary shall carry out a program of research and development of advanced computing and data science tools for geothermal energy.</content>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/g/1/qB/s618/b" id="HA0E36142E2504CE39D35DF087B3D2B39" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1313">
			<num value="b">“(b)</num>
			<heading> Programs.—</heading>
			<chapeau>The program authorized in subsection (a) shall include the following:</chapeau>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/g/1/qB/s618/b/1" id="H31FC3EEC2FA34572AE8CF6000FB36B1F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1313">
				<num value="1">“(1)</num>
				<heading> Advanced computing for geothermal systems technologies.—</heading>
				<content>Research, development, and demonstration of technologies to develop advanced data, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and related computing tools to assist in locating geothermal resources, to increase the reliability of site characterization, to increase the rate and efficiency of drilling, to improve induced seismicity mitigation, and to support enhanced geothermal systems technologies.</content>
			</paragraph>
			<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/g/1/qB/s618/b/2" id="HD758BAFB8C994BB49C447DD0F9A0FB8D" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1313">
				<num value="2">“(2)</num>
				<heading> Geothermal systems reservoir modeling.—</heading>
				<content>Research, development, and demonstration of models of geothermal reservoir performance and enhanced geothermal systems reservoir stimulation technologies and techniques, with an emphasis on accurately modeling fluid and heat flow, permeability evolution, geomechanics, geochemistry, seismicity, and operational performance over time, including collaboration with industry and field validation.</content>
			</paragraph>
		</subsection>
		<subsection identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/g/1/qB/s618/c" id="H6D5E32B56D4B40C9897A654FD94FAA72" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1314">
			<num value="c">“(c)</num>
			<heading> Coordination.—</heading>
			<content>In carrying out these programs, the Secretary shall ensure coordination and consultation with the Department of Energy’s Office of Science. The Secretary shall ensure, to the maximum extent practicable, coordination of these activities with the Department of Energy National Laboratories, institutes of higher education, and the private sector.”</content>
		</subsection>
	</section>
</__xml__>;

rewrite this as <__xml__ id="H69A3476118F04C2393A6BCD8B7920589" orig_name="quotedContent">
	<section identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/h/1/qB/s619" id="HBE5F31C6700B4E20A4C0DCFF5810CEB4" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1314">
		<num value="619">“SEC. 619.</num>
		<heading> Geothermal workforce development.</heading>
		<chapeau class="block">The Secretary shall support the development of a geothermal energy workforce through a program that—</chapeau>
		<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/h/1/qB/s619/1" id="H88720A9B39A0498B97881D7C95F07760" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1314">
			<num value="1">“(1)</num>
			<content> facilitates collaboration between university students and researchers at the National Laboratories; and</content>
		</paragraph>
		<paragraph identifier="/dZ/tIII/stA/s3002/h/1/qB/s619/2" id="H0609E42ADC45401EAE3E0AC09B24EDA4" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1314">
			<num value="2">“(2)</num>
			<content> prioritizes science in areas relevant to the mission of the Department through the application of geothermal energy tools and technologies.”</content>
		</paragraph>
	</section>
</__xml__>;
