execution.ampl:
insert end <__xml__ id="HA7CF014636074A0AB75B7EE406846942" orig_name="quotedContent">
	<subsection identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f" id="HDDC41A87DEA04EB980F3B06061F0A314" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1680">
		<num value="f">“(f)</num>
		<heading> Advanced explanation of benefits.—</heading>
		<paragraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1" id="HAB730C09A6524A8BB4F0DE6C5421E458" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
			<num value="1">“(1)</num>
			<heading> In general.—</heading>
			<chapeau>For plan years beginning on or after January 1, 2022, each group health plan, or a health insurance issuer offering group or individual health insurance coverage shall, with respect to a notification submitted under section 2799B–6 by a health care provider or health care facility to the plan or issuer for a participant, beneficiary, or enrollee under plan or coverage scheduled to receive an item or service from the provider or facility (or authorized representative of such participant, beneficiary, or enrollee), not later than 1 business day (or, in the case such item or service was so scheduled at least 10 business days before such item or service is to be furnished (or in the case of a request made to such plan or coverage by such participant, beneficiary, or enrollee), 3 business days) after the date on which the plan or coverage receives such notification (or such request), provide to the participant, beneficiary, or enrollee (through mail or electronic means, as requested by the participant, beneficiary, or enrollee) a notification (in clear and understandable language) including the following: </chapeau>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/A" id="HA57CD37D4EC746FA992A466FDDF80B58" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
				<num value="A">“(A)</num>
				<chapeau> Whether or not the provider or facility is a participating provider or a participating facility with respect to the plan or coverage with respect to the furnishing of such item or service and—</chapeau>
				<clause identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/A/i" id="H39D705F5F0604C75931B20824FD42241" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
					<num value="i">“(i)</num>
					<content> in the case the provider or facility is a participating provider or facility with respect to the plan or coverage with respect to the furnishing of such item or service, the contracted rate under such plan or coverage for such item or service (based on the billing and diagnostic codes provided by such provider or facility); and</content>
				</clause>
				<clause identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/A/ii" id="HC7A3F38181C1478E96B0BD2F8703201F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
					<num value="ii">“(ii)</num>
					<content> in the case the provider or facility is a nonparticipating provider or facility with respect to such plan or coverage, a description of how such individual may obtain information on providers and facilities that, with respect to such plan or coverage, are participating providers and facilities, if any.</content>
				</clause>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/B" id="HF9ADABF8D4B44E74ACBC5E8184CE3939" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
				<num value="B">“(B)</num>
				<content> The good faith estimate included in the notification received from the provider or facility (if applicable) based on such codes.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/C" id="H1E3EFB58BE294B319FE5A45C8DC20887" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
				<num value="C">“(C)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount the plan or coverage is responsible for paying for items and services included in the estimate described in subparagraph (B).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/D" id="H32F580744D2E437AAAE0FBA87557658F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
				<num value="D">“(D)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount of any cost-sharing for which the participant, beneficiary, or enrollee would be responsible for such item or service (as of the date of such notification).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/E" id="H793CF9836019439F9B4D5E80D54D6F89" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
				<num value="E">“(E)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount that the participant, beneficiary, or enrollee has incurred toward meeting the limit of the financial responsibility (including with respect to deductibles and out-of-pocket maximums) under the plan or coverage (as of the date of such notification).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/F" id="H1A59FE3C13EE4BD4B7220660D93A794F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1681">
				<num value="F">“(F)</num>
				<content> In the case such item or service is subject to a medical management technique (including concurrent review, prior authorization, and step-therapy or fail-first protocols) for coverage under the plan or coverage, a disclaimer that coverage for such item or service is subject to such medical management technique.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/G" id="HDCFD07EB19A0401A8D6A3C15672BD13D" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1682">
				<num value="G">“(G)</num>
				<content> A disclaimer that the information provided in the notification is only an estimate based on the items and services reasonably expected, at the time of scheduling (or requesting) the item or service, to be furnished and is subject to change.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/1/H" id="HA78E8578394B40D683C58C4C765916B3" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1682">
				<num value="H">“(H)</num>
				<content> Any other information or disclaimer the plan or coverage determines appropriate that is consistent with information and disclaimers required under this section.</content>
			</subparagraph>
		</paragraph>
		<paragraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/2" id="HC11FDCE737D740B08854CF82FD0C08A4" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1682">
			<num value="2">“(2)</num>
			<heading> Authority to modify timing requirements in the case of specified items and services.—</heading>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/2/A" id="HD31D49E6ACC548C69C805C82BA706567" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1682">
				<num value="A">“(A)</num>
				<heading> In general.—</heading>
				<content>In the case of a participant, beneficiary, or enrollee scheduled to receive an item or service that is a specified item or service (as defined in subparagraph (B)), the Secretary may modify any timing requirements relating to the provision of the notification described in paragraph (1) to such participant, beneficiary, or enrollee with respect to such item or service. Any modification made by the Secretary pursuant to the previous sentence may not result in the provision of such notification after such participant, beneficiary, or enrollee has been furnished such item or service.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/a/qB/f/2/B" id="H12AE0E884AD746089480BA3D25B8626D" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1682">
				<num value="B">“(B)</num>
				<heading> Specified item or service defined.—</heading>
				<content>For purposes of subparagraph (A), the term ‘<quotedText>specified item or service</quotedText>’ means an item or service that has low utilization or significant variation in costs (such as when furnished as part of a complex treatment), as specified by the Secretary.”</content>
			</subparagraph>
		</paragraph>
	</subsection>
</__xml__>#component(subsection());

cite.cite_text: Section 2799A–1 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300gg–19a), as added by section 102 and as further amended by the previous provisions of this title,

execution.ampl:
insert after(subsection( "(e)")) <__xml__ id="HAB668FDD0A2D4128925B66D51DC9DBBE" orig_name="quotedContent">
	<subsection identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f" id="H9C5997BDD9F94017B5016EAE362D888B" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1682">
		<num value="f">“(f)</num>
		<heading> Advanced explanation of benefits.—</heading>
		<paragraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1" id="H79D34A7164AD457CB63F368D6ABDC5FA" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1682">
			<num value="1">“(1)</num>
			<heading> In general.—</heading>
			<chapeau>For plan years beginning on or after January 1, 2022, each group health plan shall, with respect to a notification submitted under section 2799B–6 of the Public Health Service Act by a health care provider or health care facility to the plan for a participant or beneficiary under plan scheduled to receive an item or service from the provider or facility (or authorized representative of such participant or beneficiary), not later than 1 business day (or, in the case such item or service was so scheduled at least 10 business days before such item or service is to be furnished (or in the case of a request made to such plan or coverage by such participant or beneficiary), 3 business days) after the date on which the plan receives such notification (or such request), provide to the participant or beneficiary (through mail or electronic means, as requested by the participant or beneficiary) a notification (in clear and understandable language) including the following: </chapeau>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/A" id="H9E46B6DB0137452599FA840910CB3E6B" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1682">
				<num value="A">“(A)</num>
				<chapeau> Whether or not the provider or facility is a participating provider or a participating facility with respect to the plan with respect to the furnishing of such item or service and—</chapeau>
				<clause identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/A/i" id="H117F7459D20948CABA546064158B96E7" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
					<num value="i">“(i)</num>
					<content> in the case the provider or facility is a participating provider or facility with respect to the plan or coverage with respect to the furnishing of such item or service, the contracted rate under such plan for such item or service (based on the billing and diagnostic codes provided by such provider or facility); and</content>
				</clause>
				<clause identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/A/ii" id="H4DBA427A5CE94A52AB372BE53DDB645B" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
					<num value="ii">“(ii)</num>
					<content> in the case the provider or facility is a nonparticipating provider or facility with respect to such plan, a description of how such individual may obtain information on providers and facilities that, with respect to such plan, are participating providers and facilities, if any.</content>
				</clause>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/B" id="HA2B0CCC881044F1BBF24F0BAB1105B87" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="B">“(B)</num>
				<content> The good faith estimate included in the notification received from the provider or facility (if applicable) based on such codes.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/C" id="HBC163381A8AB466F9C53E1408E427766" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="C">“(C)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount the plan is responsible for paying for items and services included in the estimate described in subparagraph (B).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/D" id="HAAC048721CFA46ABA82BB760E42AEC32" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="D">“(D)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount of any cost-sharing for which the participant or beneficiary would be responsible for such item or service (as of the date of such notification).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/E" id="H14162347BAC14848BACD19364E54D2BD" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="E">“(E)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount that the participant or beneficiary has incurred toward meeting the limit of the financial responsibility (including with respect to deductibles and out-of-pocket maximums) under the plan (as of the date of such notification).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/F" id="HFBEA63623E304EB7AF6C562EBD70BE2A" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="F">“(F)</num>
				<content> In the case such item or service is subject to a medical management technique (including concurrent review, prior authorization, and step-therapy or fail-first protocols) for coverage under the plan, a disclaimer that coverage for such item or service is subject to such medical management technique.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/G" id="H23479F13BCDB4885964AFB3D380E16D1" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="G">“(G)</num>
				<content> A disclaimer that the information provided in the notification is only an estimate based on the items and services reasonably expected, at the time of scheduling (or requesting) the item or service, to be furnished and is subject to change.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/1/H" id="HA32B4E60718545FDA1E40DFAF75D9E5E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="H">“(H)</num>
				<content> Any other information or disclaimer the plan determines appropriate that is consistent with information and disclaimers required under this section.</content>
			</subparagraph>
		</paragraph>
		<paragraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/2" id="H03F6CF1394F2467B8657A2A25BB8B63F" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
			<num value="2">“(2)</num>
			<heading> Authority to modify timing requirements in the case of specified items and services.—</heading>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/2/A" id="HBE3D980CF20A48B28FFF57EB89A70D2D" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="A">“(A)</num>
				<heading> In general.—</heading>
				<content>In the case of a participant or beneficiary scheduled to receive an item or service that is a specified item or service (as defined in subparagraph (B)), the Secretary may modify any timing requirements relating to the provision of the notification described in paragraph (1) to such participant or beneficiary with respect to such item or service. Any modification made by the Secretary pursuant to the previous sentence may not result in the provision of such notification after such participant or beneficiary has been furnished such item or service.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/b/qB/f/2/B" id="HFBF8ED4B9196449B926F1D6F2169C584" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1683">
				<num value="B">“(B)</num>
				<heading> Specified item or service defined.—</heading>
				<content>For purposes of subparagraph (A), the term ‘<quotedText>specified item or service</quotedText>’ means an item or service that has low utilization or significant variation in costs (such as when furnished as part of a complex treatment), as specified by the Secretary.”</content>
			</subparagraph>
		</paragraph>
	</subsection>
</__xml__>#component(subsection());

cite.cite_text: Section 9816 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as added by section 102 and further amended by the previous provisions of this title,

execution.ampl:
insert end <__xml__ id="H1B523269145D49BABF127EDAF6EEAFA5" orig_name="quotedContent">
	<subsection identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f" id="HA5EC052F933245BE9F9E3424E794C955" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
		<num value="f">“(f)</num>
		<heading> Advanced explanation of benefits.—</heading>
		<paragraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1" id="HE10256C0A48940289FBB3AE1C146329D" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
			<num value="1">“(1)</num>
			<heading> In general.—</heading>
			<chapeau>For plan years beginning on or after January 1, 2022, each group health plan, or a health insurance issuer offering group health insurance coverage shall, with respect to a notification submitted under section 2799B–6 of the Public Health Service Act by a health care provider or health care facility to the plan or issuer for a participant or beneficiary under plan or coverage scheduled to receive an item or service from the provider or facility (or authorized representative of such participant or beneficiary), not later than 1 business day (or, in the case such item or service was so scheduled at least 10 business days before such item or service is to be furnished (or in the case of a request made to such plan or coverage by such participant or beneficiary), 3 business days) after the date on which the plan or coverage receives such notification (or such request), provide to the participant or beneficiary (through mail or electronic means, as requested by the participant or beneficiary) a notification (in clear and understandable language) including the following: </chapeau>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/A" id="H164E3E84537A4493A4F445E3DD9FDACE" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
				<num value="A">“(A)</num>
				<chapeau> Whether or not the provider or facility is a participating provider or a participating facility with respect to the plan or coverage with respect to the furnishing of such item or service and—</chapeau>
				<clause identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/A/i" id="H76F7B032CA2E47F1B10925A24E200CA1" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
					<num value="i">“(i)</num>
					<content> in the case the provider or facility is a participating provider or facility with respect to the plan or coverage with respect to the furnishing of such item or service, the contracted rate under such plan for such item or service (based on the billing and diagnostic codes provided by such provider or facility); and</content>
				</clause>
				<clause identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/A/ii" id="HCD083ADF9128438DAD8DAD9C9B4CD896" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
					<num value="ii">“(ii)</num>
					<content> in the case the provider or facility is a nonparticipating provider or facility with respect to such plan or coverage, a description of how such individual may obtain information on providers and facilities that, with respect to such plan or coverage, are participating providers and facilities, if any.</content>
				</clause>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/B" id="H7056E9B23C124344989BA8D1F0411F8E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
				<num value="B">“(B)</num>
				<content> The good faith estimate included in the notification received from the provider or facility (if applicable) based on such codes.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/C" id="H2627719565284148B54C3A79FE1FEF27" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
				<num value="C">“(C)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount the health plan is responsible for paying for items and services included in the estimate described in subparagraph (B).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/D" id="HE1759909FBFD48168DC3FE169271538E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
				<num value="D">“(D)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount of any cost-sharing for which the participant or beneficiary would be responsible for such item or service (as of the date of such notification).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/E" id="H6B21A0A92A494EADBD25959B77257951" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1684">
				<num value="E">“(E)</num>
				<content> A good faith estimate of the amount that the participant or beneficiary has incurred toward meeting the limit of the financial responsibility (including with respect to deductibles and out-of-pocket maximums) under the plan or coverage (as of the date of such notification).</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/F" id="H4546A8BBD7DD466E9B077260662CB2A2" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1685">
				<num value="F">“(F)</num>
				<content> In the case such item or service is subject to a medical management technique (including concurrent review, prior authorization, and step-therapy or fail-first protocols) for coverage under the plan or coverage, a disclaimer that coverage for such item or service is subject to such medical management technique.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/G" id="HA3D2A1EC30CD452F82A28E3B9A93273C" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1685">
				<num value="G">“(G)</num>
				<content> A disclaimer that the information provided in the notification is only an estimate based on the items and services reasonably expected, at the time of scheduling (or requesting) the item or service, to be furnished and is subject to change.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/1/H" id="HC0043DFA6D934781AF73741E22439017" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1685">
				<num value="H">“(H)</num>
				<content> Any other information or disclaimer the plan or coverage determines appropriate that is consistent with information and disclaimers required under this section.</content>
			</subparagraph>
		</paragraph>
		<paragraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/2" id="HF4C470631C13412485B177B654D8F4DF" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1685">
			<num value="2">“(2)</num>
			<heading> Authority to modify timing requirements in the case of specified items and services.—</heading>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/2/A" id="HEF72C4B2BAE14A76B1FE3C5BFB46EB1E" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1685">
				<num value="A">“(A)</num>
				<heading> In general.—</heading>
				<content>In the case of a participant or beneficiary scheduled to receive an item or service that is a specified item or service (as defined in subparagraph (B)), the Secretary may modify any timing requirements relating to the provision of the notification described in paragraph (1) to such participant or beneficiary with respect to such item or service. Any modification made by the Secretary pursuant to the previous sentence may not result in the provision of such notification after such participant or beneficiary has been furnished such item or service.</content>
			</subparagraph>
			<subparagraph identifier="/dBB/tI/s111/c/qB/f/2/B" id="H3DB284178A4F4808AD57E41EA58748CC" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1685">
				<num value="B">“(B)</num>
				<heading> Specified item or service defined.—</heading>
				<content>For purposes of subparagraph (A), the term ‘<quotedText>specified item or service</quotedText>’ means an item or service that has low utilization or significant variation in costs (such as when furnished as part of a complex treatment), as specified by the Secretary.”</content>
			</subparagraph>
		</paragraph>
	</subsection>
</__xml__>#component(subsection());
